;************************************************************************************** ;************************************************************************************** ;* ;* NAME: ;* GET_VEGETATION_L1B_REFLECTANCE ;* ;* PURPOSE: ;* RETIREVES THE L1B REFLECTANCE FROM A VEGETATION LOG FILE ;* ;* CALLING SEQUENCE: ;* RES = GET_VEGETATION_L1B_REFLECTANCE(LOG_FILE) ;* ;* INPUTS: ;* LOG_FILE - THE FULL PATH OF THE PRODUCTS LOG FILE ;* ;* KEYWORDS: ;* VERBOSE - PROCESSING STATUS OUTPUTS ;* ;* OUTPUTS: ;* TOA_REF - AN ARRAY CONTAINING THE REFLECTANCE DATA ;* ;* COMMON BLOCKS: ;* NONE ;* ;* MODIFICATION HISTORY: ;* 17 DEC 2010 - C KENT - DIMITRI-2 V1.0 ;* ;* VALIDATION HISTORY: ;* 02 DEC 2010 - C KENT - WINDOWS 32BIT MACHINE idl 7.1: COMPILATION AND EXECUTION ;* SUCCESSFUL. TESTED MULTIPLE OPTIONS ON MULTIPLE ;* PRODUCTS ;* 06 JAN 2011 - C KENT - LINUX 64-BIT MACHINE IDL 8.0: COMPILATION SUCCESSFUL, ;* NO APPARENT DIFFERENCES WHEN COMPARED TO WINDOWS MACHINE ;* ;************************************************************************************** ;************************************************************************************** FUNCTION GET_VEGETATION_L1B_REFLECTANCE,LOG_FILE,VERBOSE=VERBOSE ;------------------------------------------------ ;CHECK FILE EXISTS IF STRCMP(STRING(LOG_FILE),'') THEN BEGIN PRINT, 'VEGETATION L1B REFLECTANCE: ERROR, NO INPUT FILES PROVIDED, RETURNING...' RETURN,-1 ENDIF ;------------------------------------------------ ;CONVERT TO REFLECTANCE FILENAMES IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION L1B REFLECTANCE: DEFINING OUTPUT ARRAY' NB_BANDS=4 TEMP = STRLEN(LOG_FILE) REF_FILES = STRARR(NB_BANDS) REF_FILES[0] = STRING(STRMID(LOG_FILE,0,TEMP-7)+'B0.HDF') REF_FILES[1] = STRING(STRMID(LOG_FILE,0,TEMP-7)+'B2.HDF') REF_FILES[2] = STRING(STRMID(LOG_FILE,0,TEMP-7)+'B3.HDF') REF_FILES[3] = STRING(STRMID(LOG_FILE,0,TEMP-7)+'MIR.HDF') ;------------------------------------------------ ; CONVERSION FACTOR REF_SF = 0.0005 ;------------------------------------------------ ; RETRIEVE B0 IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION L1B REFLECTANCE: RETRIEVEING BAND 0' HDF_ID = HDF_SD_START(REF_FILES[0],/READ) SDS_NAME = HDF_SD_NAMETOINDEX(HDF_ID, 'PIXEL_DATA') SDS_ID=HDF_SD_SELECT(HDF_ID,SDS_NAME) HDF_SD_GETDATA,SDS_ID,TOA_REF_0 HDF_SD_ENDACCESS, SDS_ID HDF_SD_END,HDF_ID ;------------------------------------------------ ; RETRIEVE B2 IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION L1B REFLECTANCE: RETRIEVEING BAND 2' HDF_ID = HDF_SD_START(REF_FILES[1],/READ) SDS_NAME = HDF_SD_NAMETOINDEX(HDF_ID, 'PIXEL_DATA') SDS_ID=HDF_SD_SELECT(HDF_ID,SDS_NAME) HDF_SD_GETDATA,SDS_ID,TOA_REF_2 HDF_SD_ENDACCESS, SDS_ID HDF_SD_END,HDF_ID ;------------------------------------------------ ; RETRIEVE B3 IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION L1B REFLECTANCE: RETRIEVEING BAND 3' HDF_ID = HDF_SD_START(REF_FILES[2],/READ) SDS_NAME = HDF_SD_NAMETOINDEX(HDF_ID, 'PIXEL_DATA') SDS_ID=HDF_SD_SELECT(HDF_ID,SDS_NAME) HDF_SD_GETDATA,SDS_ID,TOA_REF_3 HDF_SD_ENDACCESS, SDS_ID HDF_SD_END,HDF_ID ;------------------------------------------------ ; RETRIEVE BM IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION L1B REFLECTANCE: RETRIEVEING BAND MIR' HDF_ID = HDF_SD_START(REF_FILES[3],/READ) SDS_NAME = HDF_SD_NAMETOINDEX(HDF_ID, 'PIXEL_DATA') SDS_ID=HDF_SD_SELECT(HDF_ID,SDS_NAME) HDF_SD_GETDATA,SDS_ID,TOA_REF_M HDF_SD_ENDACCESS, SDS_ID HDF_SD_END,HDF_ID ;----------------------------------------------- ; DEFINE TOA REF IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION L1B REFLECTANCE: APPLYING SCALING FACTOR' TOA_DIMS = SIZE(TOA_REF_0) TOA_REF = MAKE_ARRAY(TOA_DIMS[1],TOA_DIMS[2],NB_BANDS,/FLOAT) TOA_REF[*,*,0] = FLOAT(TOA_REF_0)*REF_SF TOA_REF[*,*,1] = FLOAT(TOA_REF_2)*REF_SF TOA_REF[*,*,2] = FLOAT(TOA_REF_3)*REF_SF TOA_REF[*,*,3] = FLOAT(TOA_REF_M)*REF_SF ;------------------------------------------------ ; MAY NEED TO CHECK BAD_FLAG TO REMOVE HIGH REFLECTANCES-------------------------------------------------- ;------------------------------------------------ ; RETURN GEOLOCAITON INFORMATION RETURN,TOA_REF END
